result.eng: They were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ga: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog
result.orig: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ina seasaṁ i lár na sráide ag scaipeaḋ bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.

result.ga: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráid
result.orig: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráid
result.html: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráidShe collapsed on the street.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sí as a seasaṁ ar an tsráidShe collapsed on the street.

result.eng: She is running in general elections.
result.ga: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchán
result.orig: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchán
result.html: Tá sí ag seasamh san olltoghchánShe is running in general elections.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ag seasaṁ san olltoġċánShe is running in general elections.

result.eng: I am asking you to be my bridesmaid.
result.ga: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phósta
result.orig: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phósta
result.html: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phóstaI am asking you to be my bridesmaid.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag iarraiḋ ort seasaṁ liom ar lá mo ṗóstaI am asking you to be my bridesmaid.

result.ga: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le Seán

result.html: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le SeánThis is Seán's best man.
